scares.description: There is a sudden knock at the door behind Justine.
There is a sudden audio scare as Justine notices Alex's parents sitting on the couch
Woman grabs Justine from behind and throws her to the ground
Justine looks up to see a woman coming out of her ceiling.
Matthew's face is replaced with a horrifying twisted visage.
James notices Alex's parents in the reflection of the TV. Accompanied by audio scare.
The children all spin suddenly to look at James
After exiting the basement, a well-telegraphed scare reveals figures approaching from the other room, accompanied by a stinger
Marcus attacks the man and spits on him and kills him
During a quiet moment, the person in the doorway is startled upon realizing the person in bed is looking at them.
The woman standing at the door looks over, accompanied by a sound effect
Alex steps to one side, revealing James standing behind him. Accompanied by audio scare.
As Justine steps on the salt, someone comes screaming out of the darkness behind her.
After a quiet moment, there's a cut to loud banging on a doorway and yelling that may startle sensitive viewers.
After exiting the bathroom, a figure appears in the hallway doorway, accompanied by a sound effect that may startle some viewers.
Gladys comes screaming out of the darkness.
